snippet: MARCUS--Amy L.,originally from New Jersey and longtime resident of New York City, passed away peacefully on February 5. Beloved daughter, sister, aunt, friend will be remembered for her smiles and laughter. Beloved member of Town and Village Synagogue, Times Squares Dancers of New York. Graduated from Beth Israel Nursing School and Pace College. Amy worked at Beth Israel and the 92nd Street Y's Senior Program. Amy will be missed by many! She is survived by a sister, a brother, four nieces, three nephews. Services will be held February 7th, at "The Riverside," 180 West 76th St., New York at 10am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MARCUS, AMY L.
